message: Simplified draftService.ts by removing USE_UNIFIED_MEMORY flag and dead code branches. Removed progress.txt (temp file) and added to .gitignore. All 393 tests pass.
next_steps: PRD files remain for tracking incomplete work
omiClassifier and memoryIngestion extractEntities are not duplicates (different return types/purposes)
